modName: A Book and A Letter By Divayth Fyr
summary: Adds two works by Divayth Fyr.
descriptionHtml: Adds two works, a book and a letter, by Divayth Fyr to Anise's Cabin in Skyrim.  The book is titled "Sorcery Is Not Necromancy" and the letter "To My Former Student."  Both can also be manually added to your inventory using the console, by typing "help necromancy" or "help student".
author: Myself
